items.sentence: I\'ve never had to do anything like this before.
That was easier to do than Tom said it would be.
What\'s your favorite free software application?
I know a good Mexican restaurant on Park Street.
I haven\'t been able to go to school for a week.
I haven\'t eaten chocolate since I was thirteen.
It\'s Tom and Mary\'s wedding anniversary today.
Didn\'t you know that Tom could play the guitar?
Don\'t you know everything I have is yours, too?
Tom can\'t help us right now. He\'s really busy.
